entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus
Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.

entity.name: COVID-19: Public health updates
entity.description: Information on how to take care of yourself and others from authorities and public officials.

text: This #MemorialDay weekend, if you choose to spend time outdoors, stay 6ft apart & wear a cloth face cover to slow the spread of #COVID19. Learn more at https://t.co/c4F0aouMLd. https://t.co/64SJFJYHPJ
